Salomea of Berg

Born: Cir 1093

Marriage (1): Prince Boleslaw of Poland III "wrymouth" in 1115

Died: 27 Jul 1144 aged about 51

Salomea married Prince Boleslaw of Poland III "wrymouth", son of Duke Wladyslaw Herman of Poland I and Judith Premyslid of Bohemia, in 1115. (Prince Boleslaw of Poland III "wrymouth" was born on 20 Aug 1086 and died on 28 Oct 1138.)
